resources.string: The drug lord wants to retire, but the criminal world does not let go. Successful return of Guy Ritchie to the roots.
A teenager takes revenge on humanoids - cannibals for the murder of his mother. Cult anime - series based on post-apocalyptic manga
An ex-soldier takes over a criminal family business. Stylish British saga with Cillian Murphy

The Arcane animation project is based on the popular computer game League of Legends. The events of the animated series unfold at a time when hextech was invented, and the path of the legendary champions Vi and Jinx was just beginning.
Lock stock and two smoking barrels
Four friends from London need to find Â£500,000 somewhere. Cult black comedy, Guy Ritchie\'s debut.

The action of the first and second seasons takes place in Madrid around a group of adventurers using city names as code names, led by the mysterious Professor. Their plan is to steal 2.4 billion euros from the Spanish Royal Mint (Spanish) Russian. The team, which took 67 people hostage, will have to print money within 11 days, while confronting the elite police forces. After that, the team members are forced to lay low for two years, and then organize a second robbery, this time - the Bank of Spain.
The brave rabbit makes a career in the police of the animal city. Oscar-winning comedy with serious overtones
